chunk: Egg fingers recipe A quick and easy finger food – just boil, peel, slice and you’re done! Age: 6 months or older Prep: 5 mins Cook: 5 mins Portions: 2 (approx) Ingredients - 1 egg Method Bring a pan of water to the boil. Gently place the egg into the pan, boil for 5 minutes. Once cooked, place the egg in a bowl of cold water to cool down (2 to 3 minutes). When cool, peel the outer shell and slice the egg into quarters (4 fingers). Offer your baby 2 egg fingers. Information: Combine the egg fingers with one of our first taste recipes. Weaning tip Finger foods help babies get used to different textures and also help develop hand-eye coordination.
title: Egg Fingers
description: A quick and easy finger food – just boil, peel, slice and you’re done!
